Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Choose the sound preset of your liking.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Choose a variety of different sounds for the Spin Dash.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description:
Allows you to which Boost Filter you wish to play during Cyber Space. Choose either the vanilla boost filter or one that mimics the filters to sound like they're from Sonic Generations.

All changes are still applied no matter what option you chose.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir3
Description: Determine if you wish to keep ''Mystery Girl'' or replace it with each Titan's instrumental theme when encountering them for the first time.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir4
Description: Variants for Supreme's theme intro.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir5
Description: Choose the boss theme for The End.
Improving the vanilla sounds by restoring sound details inspired by previous titles and replacing existing sounds with higher quality versions.
Replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.
Reverts the Air Tricks / Wild Rush sound back to their original and unmodified version.

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Vanilla Overhaul (Frontiers) - No Air Tricks + Old Footsteps
Description: Reverts the Air Tricks / Wild Rush sound back to their original and unmodified version and replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.
Alternative Boost sound (Sonic Free Riders kick dash).

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Vanilla Overhaul (Frontiers) - Alternative Boost + Old Footsteps
Description: Alternative Boost sound (Sonic Free Riders kick dash) with footsteps sounds from previous titles.

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Vanilla Overhaul (Frontiers) - Alternative Boost + No Air Tricks
Description: Original / unmodified Air Tricks / Wild Rush sound with an alternative Boost sound (Sonic Free Riders kick dash).

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Vanilla Overhaul (Frontiers) - Alternative Boost + Old Footsteps + No Air Tricks
Description: Original / unmodified  Air Tricks / Wild Rush sound back, replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles with an alternative Boost sound (Sonic Free Riders kick dash).
Replaces the modified Frontiers sounds with those from Boost Era games (Unleashed, Colors, Generations and Lost World)
Replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.
Reverts the Air Tricks / Wild Rush sound back to their original and unmodified version.

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Boost Era - No Air Tricks + Old Footsteps
Description: Reverts the Air Tricks / Wild Rush sound back to their original and unmodified version and replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.
Alternative Cyloop sound (Sonic Lost World parkour).

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Boost Era - Alternative Cyloop + Old Footsteps
Description: Alternative Cyloop sound (Sonic Lost World parkour) with footsteps sounds from previous titles.

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Boost Era - Alternative Cyloop + No Air Tricks
Description: AlternativeCyloop sound (Sonic Lost World parkour) with footsteps sounds from previous titles.

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Boost Era - Alternative Cyloop + Old Footsteps + No Air Tricks
Description: Original / unmodified  Air Tricks / Wild Rush sound back, replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles with an alternative Cyloop sound (Sonic Lost World parkour).
Replaces the modified Frontiers SFX with sounds from the Dreamcast Era (Adventure 1, 2 and Heroes)
Keeps the modified SFX but replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.
Alternative Cyloop sound.

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Dreamcast Era - Alternative Cyloop + Old Footsteps
Description: Alternative Cyloop sound and replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.
Alternative Drop Dash sound.

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Dreamcast Era - Alternative Drop Dash + Old Footsteps
Description: Alternative Drop Dash sound and replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Dreamcast Era - Alternative Drop Dash + Alternative Cyloop + Old Footsteps
Description: Alternative Drop Dash and Cyloop sounds and replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.
Merges sounds from each Preset into one!
Replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.
Keeps the modified SFX but reverts the Air Tricks / Wild Rush sound back to it's original version.

GameplayEnum.DisplayName: Hybrid - No Air Tricks + Old Footsteps
Description: Reverts the Air Tricks / Wild Rush sound back to their original and unmodified version and replaces the vanilla footsteps sounds with those from previous titles.

Allows the use of other sound mods in favor for compatibility.

To make it work, just drag the associated files that modify either ''sound'' or ''general'' directories. (raw_custom1).

Allows the use of other sound mods in favor for compatibility.

To make it work, just drag the associated files that modify either ''sound'' or ''general'' directories. (raw_custom2).

Allows the use of other sound mods in favor for compatibility.

To make it work, just drag the associated files that modify either ''sound'' or ''general'' directories. (raw_custom3).
Adds the Drop Dash charging sound, making it faithful to Frontiers.
Keeps the Spin Dash sounds unchanged.
Replacing the Spin Dash charging sound with that from the Wii / PS2 version of Sonic Unleashed.
Replacing the Spin Dash charging sound with that from the Adventure series' Light Speed Shoes / Shadow the Hedgehog / Sonic '06.
Replacing the Spin Dash charging sound with that from Sonic Adventure.

Replacing ''I'm With You'' with an edited version of ''Vandalize''.

I call it ''Vandalize [Re-Edit]'' :)
Replacing ''I'm With You'' with ''One Way Dream''.
Does not modify The End's theme.
Keeps ''Mystery Girl'' when encountering a Titan for the first time.
Replaces ''Mystery Girl'' with an instrumental version of each of the Titan's boss theme.
Replaces Sonic's awkward voice clips when he melts from the lava with those that he makes when he falls off the map.
Keeps Sonic's vanilla voice clips.

Replaces Sonic's awkward voice clips when he melts from the lava with voice clips from Sonic Boom: Rise of Lyric that serve the same purpose.

Not the ideal choice but whatever, I included it for fun.

I have to admit, Roget sucks when it comes to recording voice clips for dying :/
Adds new sound effects and voice clips for Sonic in different scenarios while fighting the Titans in order to make him more interactive rather than remaining mute.

Disables Sonic's newly added dialogue. In order words, keep Sonic the silent protagonist he was.

However, it will keep the extra sound effects.
Enable the Cyber Space OST edits.
Makes the Cyber Space stages' boost filters sound akin to that from Sonic Generations.
Replaces the instrumental part in the intro with the first verse of I'm Here.
Keeps the vanilla instrumental intro.
